body: @rmlarsen is there any existing C++/python helper function that can return a `RewriterConfig` that with all default Grappler optimizers disabled? I think this is very useful at least for testing, see e.g. [tf_cnn_benchmark](https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks/blob/master/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks/benchmark_cnn.py#L706).
body_html: @rmlarsen is there any existing C++/python helper function that can return a RewriterConfig that with all default Grappler optimizers disabled? I think this is very useful at least for testing, see e.g. tf_cnn_benchmark.
